nodes.title: Using formats with Prettier and lints with ESLint + StandardJS in a TypeScript Project
nodes.excerpt: Programs should be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute. --  Harold Abelson hey

nodes.title: The Art of Computer Programming
nodes.excerpt: Computer Science is a theory, yet Computer Programming — an art. The elegantly written code, like any literature, is inspirational, and…
